Meals

Our in-house Food Service Department will take care of all of your dietary needs during your stay.

You will receive 3 meals daily.

Each morning, you will receive a menu from which to select your meals for the next day.

Should you not be available when the order is taken, you will receive the Chef's Choice for the day.

If you would like to request a special meal, such as kosher or halal, please indicate so during your admission to the hospital.

Certain conditions or treatments may require that your doctor prescribes certain dietary items for you.

This is normal and part of a treatment plan for your specific condition or recovery.

In such cases, your doctor will indicate to us when you are allowed to order "normal" dietary items from the menu.

Day case theatre patients will be served a light meal post-operatively.

Please feel free to request a second helping.
